list_definition.definition: of or concerning a position of authority
done or confirmed by people in authority etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: the official result of the race.

list_definition.definition: a person who holds a position of authority

list_ex_of_english: The question is whether anyone should care how diligent these officials really are.
Agency officials viewed numbers and studies as a resource in achieving a larger political agenda.
River officials also sought to enhance their status as technical experts through the construction and maintenance of memorial halls and temples honoring their predecessors.
In our field work and during the survey we spent considerable time discussing with officials about the way they pushed water management reforms.
My school's officials tend to think that way.
Finally, public officials have routinely drawn distinctions between the substance consumed and a consumption habit.
Although thousands of people obeyed the law and the forestry officials' procedures, most probably did not.
In my experience, architects too often take a high-handed view of the ignorance of the officials who deal with applications for altering listed buildings.
